Institution Name: SHEIK IBRAHIM EL-TAYEB INSTITUTE, KANO, (AFFL TO BAYERO UNIV, KANO), KANO STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Arabic and any other Arts subject.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Arabic and three (3) other relevant subjects.
Subjects: Arabic and two (2) subjects from Arts and/or Social Sciences.
